title.rendered: RHINO BAR SUIT Y62 PATROL Series 4

content.rendered:
he Nissan Y62 PATROL 3D Evolution bar is in stock. the lightest and most robust, feature rich bar on the market.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Flat Black Powder coat as standard and can be colour coded as an option. It is a 3 and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate and recovery points not offered on other brands. The mid top section comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are also an option on many other brands and flip up number plate bracket.

Our bar is fully compatible with your adaptive cruise control sensor, head light washers, and parking sensors. Don’t settle for a bar that makes your amazing looking Y62 look like a truck and also lose all the features you have already paid for. Our bar will provide the same protection as a traditional bar and is made of the same materials. It will provide amazing angle of approach. It comes standard with a 5mm alloy bash plate to give you maximum under body protection. And as noted you maintain full function of all your accessories.

Don’t be fooled by imitations. Our Rhino4x4 Evolution 3D bar for the Nissan Patrol Y62 comes standard and includes within the weight rated recovery points and a full 5mm alloy bash plate.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated LED Foglights with DRL and Indicator in built

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Flip up number plate bracket

Hi Lift Jacking Points

Front Parking Sensor and Headlight Washer Holes – We can provide blanketing plugs for vehicles that don’t require sensors or washers.

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT Y62 PATROL Series 4

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
